channel.title: Meetups on R-Ladies Chicago
channel.description: Recent content in Meetups on R-Ladies Chicago

item.title: Recap: rstudio::conf 2019 lightning talks
item.description: Our first 2019 Meetup was a series of lightning talks based on what we learned at rstudio::conf2019. This year, six R-Ladies Chicago members were at rstudio::conf (and we met even more attendees from Chicago!). Overall, the conference was inspiring and we are excited to use what we learned to host great events for R-Ladies Chicago in 2019! Florencia Mangini wrote a great blog post recapping our meetup. Be sure to check it out!
